title: Sakanwa
author: Sakanwa
content: I have been asking my self that what if it happens that the world we are in no w is just a dream and God wakes all of us up both the rich and poor, because with the way things are really going in life is like everything is not going as plans.What will you do if you discover that the recent life we are living now or in now it all a lie.

comments.author: digaran
comments.body: What exactly is a lie, more importantly where did you hear a lie from God? Dream? No, but life on earth compared to eternity is statistically less than a nanosecond in comparison with "eternity". Just like the way you feel how fast the time had passed when you think about the past that we sometimes refer to it as it was like yesterday.Things get really interesting when you look at the life as a test, at this stage you realize you'd need to study first, and at this second stage, you realize there are too many paradoxes/contradictions and you'd feel that you need guidance, this is the third stage where you need to be careful, ask directly from the source, and God shall provide.The story of life is not pre-dictated, however it is prewritten but we will never know it while we living it, that's why we can do whatever we want, and the point of the test is exactly that, "we can do whatever we want"  in the face of it all, what are we going to do with that freedom?

Once this beautiful dream of ours is broken, we will respond to the call of the creator and go to the other side. comments.author: MIner1448
comments.body: If I found out that my current life is a lie and in fact it was all a dream or an illusion, it would be quite an amazing experience. In that case, I would probably have experienced mixed feelings, since the reality that I knew would turn out to be non-existent.However, as with any unexpected situation, I would try to adjust and adapt. Rather than just abandon the idea of reality and forget about the previous life, I would look for ways to understand what happened and how to move on.Perhaps I would have questioned the nature of this new reality and explored it more deeply. Maybe I would look for other people who also realized that it was all an illusion, and together we would try to solve the mystery and find a way to the true reality.However, it is important to remember that we all create meaning in our lives based on what we experience and believe. Even if my previous life turned out to be a lie, the experience and lessons I learned from it would still be important and useful. I would strive to use these lessons and my new experiences to build a meaningful life in the new reality that I discovered.

Your spirit could go to another place but I definitely do not believe that you come back to life in another form.

comments.author: syedakhlaque
comments.body: This world is not just a dream or a lie but a reality. The system of this world is running in a coordinated and orderly way. Sun, moon, stars are rising and setting on time. Seasons come and go in their own time. People are being born in the world and people are also dying. The different colors of flowers, their fragrance, the juice in fruits, the chirping of birds, the rotation of planets and stars in their own axis, all this is by whose order. And who and how is this system running? All these facts invite us to ponder۔Man's own existence, his movements and instincts, his ability to think and the passion to do, all these are not just like that. These are all things to think and consider. That's what it's all about. The voice from the existence of a human being, who am I, what am I? And what is the purpose of my creation? Not just like that. All these things make you think.
